text:
I set up a virtual folder to display a directory content. By clicking on the files names w/white spaces the link gets not resolved. Every white space gets replaced by a "%20" but clicking leads to "file not found".

File names w/o white spaces are no problem.

Please advice.

mailto:tiw4@gmx.net
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Encoding problem, we should fix it in 3.3

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Added code to do the right URL encoding, recycle the streams, etc. Next nightly should work.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Fixed in 3.3, new Encoder and refactored output.
